Text: Hmm, I should have labeled Friday Night in Beast House as the 4th volume in the Beast House Chronicles but it slipped my mind.
You have made my Hubby the happiest man alive!  Thanks!

thank you so much for the priceless collection.
youve made me the happiest man too.

I can highly recommend this author! I have read all his books and I was seeing if I could find some ebooks for a friend of mine to try. Some fab reads here, and they will work on Kindle too (Kindle/Mobipocket same thing). If I can get a full download, I will seed.

I love Richard Laymon; this is a real treasure trove.

Thank you so very much!!!!!!
